alert.note: Alert for Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 1:54PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Malheur County through 230 PM PDT... At 153 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Iron Point, or 22 miles north of Rome, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Birch Creek Campground around 300 PM MDT. Diamond Butte around 320 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
